title: Daily: Spies & crooks, together again. Artful spearphishers will eventually learn to proofread.
description: Daily: Spies & crooks, together again. Artful spearphishers will eventually learn to proofread. Malek Ben Salem from Accenture Labs explains how decoy apps are helping secure mobile devices.
